title: Queen Bee

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Recreate Queen Bee's hive within the town by killing everyone

desc:
Post 4863
Lcorp Waw
Threat 49
When visited have 30 coinflips
If either more than 22 or less than 17 of those are heads, trigger the below ability.
The visitor becomes tagged by Queen Bee.
As soon as someone is tagged, whoever they visit becomes tagged aswell.
The whole town will be informed as soon as half of it is tagged
As soon as everyone, excluding abnormalities, is tagged, everyone tagged will die to an overoverkill level attack.
Once the Queen Bee dies, the first tagged person will become a new Queen Bee ONCE.
If multiple people would classify as "first tagged", randomize who will become Queen Bee.
You will always know the amount of tagged people, but not who is tagged.
